lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.
You and a bunch of friends decide that it might be a good idea to get a "permanent eyebrow" tattoo.
You locate the tattoo shop. It looks very dark inside.
The man who runs the place has an extremely large belly, smokes a cigar and has alcohol on his breath.
He takes out the electronic tattoo needles, wipes them off on his pants, burps and says, "Dis won't hurt a bit, doll."
He looks at you and says, "You look just like another girl who came in here," then he stops himself and says, "Nah, she got gangrene. I woulda noticed that."
He tilts your head up toward the light. The bare bulb shines in your eyes.
He brings the buzzing needle close to your face...
He tattoos a fake eyebrow on each eye. I guess you wanted it pretty badly. You are much happier now.
